Pre-Game Insights: This match is a virtual quarter-final at the T20 World Cup 2024.
West Indies and South Africa are co-hosts and are unbeaten through the group stage.
South Africa has a perfect record of six wins in six games.
South Africa is being spoken of as champion material and there is a possibility that this could be the year they win a T20 World Cup.
West Indies might have something to say about that.
Others: Additional tickets have been made available for the T20 World Cup game between West Indies and South Africa.
The match will be played at North Sound, Antigua.
The forecast for the day on Sunday is not great, but the precipitation probability decreases to 17% in the evening.
